sentence.Network_en: Sara Sidle: What do you think caused these marks?
sentence.Network_cn: 莎拉·西德勒: 你认为是什么导致了这些痕迹?

sentence.Network_en: He can not sidle away from personal responsibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不能逃避个人的责任.

sentence.Network_en: The young man began to sidle near the pretty girl sitting on the log.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个年轻人开始贴近那个坐在原木上的漂亮女孩.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... sidewise 向一边的 sidle 横行 Sidonian 西顿人.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... needle 针，针叶 sidle （偷偷地）侧身而行 kindle 着火、点燃.
英语专业八级考... ... 6.sickbay：n. (船上、寄宿学校等的)病室 9.sidle：v. (悄悄地)横这周，（偷偷地）侧身挨近 10.sighting：n. 看见.
赵丽速记GRE词汇口诀 - 豆丁网 ... impale 刺穿 sidle 悄悄移动 boggle 畏缩口诀：.

list.abs: Hurstwood nerved himself and sidled near ., 赫斯渥鼓起勇气 , 侧身走近了他.
She sidled out of the crowded room ., 她悄悄地侧身走出那挤满人的房间.
She sidled away ., 她悄悄离去.
sidled through the narrow doorway ., 侧身穿过狭窄的门道.
She sidled away ., 她悄悄离去.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: back-formation from sideling (see sidelong)

entry.tran: 悄悄地走;小心翼翼地走
entry.def: If you sidle somewhere, you walk there in a quiet or cautious way, as if you do not want anyone to notice you.

example.ex: A young man sidled up to me and said, 'May I help you?'
example.tran: 一个年轻人悄悄走向我说道，“我可以帮你吗？”

example.ex: He was sidling into the bar, obviously trying to be inconspicuous.
example.tran: 他悄悄地走进酒吧，显然不想引起注意。

sentences.sentence: "The young man began to sidle near the pretty girl sitting on the log"

auth_sentence.content: Everyone who enters must sidle past them, deciding which body to face.

auth_sentence.content: His melodies sidle up to you and breathe gently in your ear, much like early Carla Bley.
